name: Nightmare Highway CocoFest Edition
description:
Nightmare Highway CocoFEST Edition for the Tandy Color Computer 1, 2, & 3

Physical DVD-ROM edition with Bonus Content (including unreleased Fourth Rainbow Adventure Contest losing entry text adventure) also available: Nightmare Highway DVD-ROM.

As you start your journey to CocoFEST, you notice the road ahead is littered with rogue furniture.

You realize you are driving on the NIGHTMARE HIGHWAY.

 In 2019, Terry Steen lived it. Now you get to simulate it in SG4 graphics.

This was the an edition that was intended for 2020 CocoFEST, that got cancelled due to COVID. It adds the "Power of Terry." Collect the letters to spell Terry and the road ahead will clear for a short while. You can increase your score by going to 4th gear while the road is clear.
